title: Human-AI Task Allocation Simulator
description: Interactive simulation for experimenting with different human-AI task allocation strategies and observing productivity outcomes across multiple work scenarios
creator: Claude Code
subject: Human-AI Collaboration
Future of Work
Workforce Transformation
Task Allocation
learningObjectives: Apply collaboration principles to task allocation decisions
Analyze tradeoffs between quality, cost, and throughput
Evaluate which tasks benefit from human vs. AI processing

controls.name: Scenario
controls.description: Work context selection affecting AI/human performance characteristics

controls.name: Task Rate
controls.description: Number of tasks generated per minute

controls.name: Complexity
controls.description: Base complexity level of generated tasks

controls.name: Reset
controls.description: Clear all tasks and reset metrics

assumptions: Tasks can be cleanly categorized by complexity
AI and human performance varies predictably by scenario
Quality and cost are measurable outcomes
limitations: Simplified allocation logic compared to real-world decisions
Does not model learning effects or skill development
Quality metrics are simulated, not measured
